content.question: Which of the following replacements for /* initial value */ and /* updated value */ can be used so that the method works as intended?

choices.label: Replace /* initial value */ with true and replace /* updated value */ with true.
Replace /* initial value */ with true and replace /* updated value */ with false.
Replace /* initial value */ with false and replace /* updated value */ with true.
Replace /* initial value */ with false and replace /* updated value */ with false.

content.answer: Replace /* initial value */ with true and replace /* updated value */ with false.

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
